  • Method Details

    • updateMarket

      public void updateMarket(int maxCount)
      Clears the list: (availableAthletes, availableEquipment) and adds new Equipment and Athletes
      Parameters:
      maxCount - maximum number of athlete/items to list

    • purchaseAthlete

      public void purchaseAthlete(int atIndex, boolean withUpdate) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException, IllegalArgumentException, TeamMemberLimitException
      Removes athlete from market and adds to player's team with the option of updating market
      Parameters:
      atIndex - index of Athlete to purchase
      withUpdate - option to update purchasable Athletes in Market
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is out of range
      IllegalArgumentException - if insufficient money to purchase
      TeamMemberLimitException - if team has reached the member limit

    • sellAthlete

      athlete - Athlete to sell
